content: @Eric Haas I am confused by the changes to DeviceUseRequest- I can't find a reference to the device in the new resource?

http://hl7-fhir.github.io/deviceuserequest-definitions.html#DeviceUseRequest.code should be choice of code | Reference(Device) That sounds like a needed change after the freeze. Thanks for catching that.
well, going to be a different name element too then. But what do you mean, change after the freeze? after ballot/
I mean can I update it now - element name = device
need to propose that on committers channel and give committers 24 hours to comment
